# RadioRadioX Mobile App - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
React Native mobile app using Expo for RadioRadioX internet radio station.

## Features
- Streaming radio player (auto-play on launch)
- Talk Back feedback form
- Social sharing features
- Magic link authentication (passwordless)
- Profile management
- Bottom tab navigation (Radio, Share, Talk Back, Profile)

## Tech Stack
- React Native with Expo
- Bottom tab navigation
- WebView for radio stream integration
- Email-based magic link authentication

## Color Scheme
- Primary: #000000
- Secondary: #f5f5f5
- Tertiary: #606c76
- Primary Text: #dd3333
- Secondary Text: #a50d12
- Success: #04a24c
- Error: #e21c3d
- Warning: #facd0c
- Info: #1c4d94
